flashcards.question: What are the core topics covered in the AWS Certified AI Practitioner bootcamp?
flashcards.answer: Core AI/ML concepts in AWS, AWS services for AI & ML, real-world scenarios, practice questions, and exam strategies

flashcards.question: Name some AWS services used for AI & ML mentioned in the text

flashcards.prompt: Target audience for the AIF-C01 bootcamp
flashcards.content: Both beginners new to AI and those strengthening their AWS knowledge

flashcards.definition: AWS service used for building, training, and deploying machine learning models
AWS natural language processing service for text analysis
AWS service for image and video analysis using machine learning

flashcards.content: To guide learners from fundamentals to exam readiness for the AIF-C01 exam

flashcards.question: What approach does the bootcamp take to teaching AI concepts?
flashcards.answer: Breaking down concepts one at a time and providing real-world scenarios

flashcards.prompt: Learning materials included in the bootcamp
flashcards.content: Core concepts, AWS services, real-world scenarios, practice questions, and exam strategies
